alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Ontario; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:46AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Wayne, Wyoming, southeastern Erie, Livingston, southeastern Orleans, Monroe, eastern Genesee and Ontario Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 945 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hilton to 6 miles northwest of Chaffee. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Chili, Batavia, Canandaigua, Brockport, Geneseo, East Rochester, Hilton, Webster, Fairport, Dansville, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Letchworth State Park, Ontario, Henrietta, Penfield, and Newark. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 12. Interstate 90 between exits 43 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall may occur with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
